attributes.action: petition for tax reductions across all taxes including alcohol, petrol, cigarettes, driving, VAT, income tax and every other tax in the UK
attributes.additional_details: My e petition is for tax cuts across every tax in the UK this will be achieved through harder Cuts throughout public services and the social welfare state. Some people may disagree  however when you consider in total you are taxed 35% to 45% of what you earn it starts to change your mind. Do you realize that around 80% of petrol is tax, its the second income tax the government never told you about, 20%VAT, £1500 council tax , from £480 a week you take home £370. What's the point in working I may as well live on social welfare.
